publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3190 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Congratulations to Lennox Lewisâ€”That the Parliament warmly congratulates Mr Lennox Lewis on his great victory as World Boxing Council and International Boxing Federation heavyweight boxing champion; regards him as an excellent role model for young people of all backgrounds and a fine ambassador for our country, and extends a cordial invitation to him to visit the Parliament on his next trip to Scotland. Supported by: David McLetchie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Alex Fergusson*, Bill Aitken*
S1M-3190 Congratulations to Lennox Lewis (lodged on 10 June 2002) Phil Gallie*
S1M-3190 Congratulations to Lennox Lewis (lodged on 10 June 2002) Mary Scanlon*

S1M-3190 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Congratulations to Lennox Lewis-That the Parliament warmly congratulates Mr Lennox Lewis on his great victory as World Boxing Council and International Boxing Federation heavyweight boxing champion; regards him as an excellent role model for young people of all backgrounds and a fine ambassador for our country, and extends a cordial invitation to him to visit the Parliament on his next trip to Scotland. Supported by: David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Fergusson, Bill Aitken, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon
S1M-3190 Congratulations to Lennox Lewis (lodged on 10 June 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-3190 Congratulations to Lennox Lewis (lodged on 10 June 2002) Mr Keith Harding*
